Title: Establishes protections for minors who are featured in influencer-generated content
Summary: Establishes protections for minors who are featured in influencer-generated content that generate earnings from being shared on social media or other video-sharing websites.
LawCode: Amd Art 4-A Art Head, §§150, 130, 131 & 132, ren §154-a to be §156, add §155, Lab L; add §7-7.2, EPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the estates, powers and trusts law, in relation to establishing protections for minors who are featured in influencer-generated content
